name: No-Bake Trail Mix Bars
author: RAVRAM
summary: Great snack or dessert for a picnic or other gathering! Trail mix ingredients in a bar!
ingredients: 4 cups toasted oat cereal (such as Cheerios®)
2 cups crispy rice cereal (such as Rice Krispies®)
2 cups candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)
directions: Combine oat cereal, rice cereal, peanuts, milk chocolate pieces, and raisins in a large bowl
Combine syrup and sugar in a saucepan and bring to a boil
Remove from heat, stir in peanut butter, and mix until well combined
Pour over cereal mixture in the bowl
Wet your hands with cold water and press mixture into the pan to even it out
Cool until solid and cut into bars
